General.Name: Thinkific Labs Inc
General.Description: Thinkific Labs Inc. engages in the development, marketing, and support management of cloud-based platform in Canada, the United States, and internationally. The company's platform enables entrepreneurs and established businesses to create, market, sell, and deliver online courses and other learning products. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 369 Terminal Avenue, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6A 4C4

1.Name: Mr. Matthew  Smith B.Sc.
1.Title: Co-Founder, Chief Strategy Officer & Acting Chief Revenue Officer
